headline: Jordan: ‘Scary Stuff’ What the Biden Administration Has Done with First Amendment Rights, Second Amendment Liberties
author: Women System
sentences:
So that the federal government can set up a national database?”
“This is scary stuff, what they’ve done to our First Amendment rights, and now what they’re doing to our Second Amendment liberties,” Jordan added.
Monday on FNC’s “The Ingraham Angle,” Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH) condemned the Biden administration’s use of government power to infringe on the exercise of First and Second Amendment rights.
I mean, I – think about this, Hillary Clinton destroyed 30,000 emails while she was under investigation, and now every single gun purchase by a law-abiding American is being preserved.
Jordan and his colleagues penned a letter to White House officials expressing their concern, noting much of the policy had been implemented in just one year of the Biden presidency.
And frankly, we didn’t realize it was quite this number of purchases over the last 20-some years that the federal government is now compiling.”
So yes, there’s a number of us who are very concerned about this.
Now we find out the ATF is going after law-abiding gun owners.
You got the DOJ setting up a domestic terrorism unit.
“All from one administration, all in a single year.
“You got the FBI going after parents.
And this is why we wrote the letter.
